name: To the Night, What is the Night's
desc: You encounter a strange door out in the wilds of Natlan...

customize.text: Located on the stone bridge west of the <color=#ece5d8>Ancestral Temple</color> waypoint, lower than the waypoint.
Located on the stone bridge north of the <color=#ece5d8>Ancestral Temple</color> waypoint.
Located on the stone bridge east of the <color=#ece5d8>Ancestral Temple</color> waypoint, higher than the waypoint.

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Complete the puzzles around the <color=#ece5d8>Ancestral Temple</color> to obtain three

customize.name: Courier's Trial Keystone
customize.desc: A stone mechanism used to unlock the gates of ancient altars. Among the Scions of the Canopy, this mechanism serves as a trial machine, where only the most experienced couriers are said to be able to acquire all three keystones in a short span of time.

customize.text:
, then go to the gate of the ruins to start the quest.
<color=#ffffff>Rewards</color>

customize.name: "Scions of the Canopy" Reputation EXP
customize.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Scions of the Canopy)

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Shattered Night Jade
customize.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. If it could be pieced together, perhaps something extraordinary might happen...

customize.text:
Talk to the strange person
Go to the camp
Talk to Legba
Open the gate
Search the ruins
Find a way to venture deeper into the ruins
Defeat the will of the Wayob
Talk to Legba
Place the obsidian statue back on the altar
Listen to the distant whispers
Talk to Legba

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Courier's Trial Keystone
customize.desc: A stone mechanism used to unlock the gates of ancient altars. Among the Scions of the Canopy, this mechanism serves as a trial machine, where only the most experienced couriers are said to be able to acquire all three keystones in a short span of time.

customize.name: Crude Obsidian Statue
customize.desc: A uniquely sculpted obsidian statue with very distinctive contours. It was once used by the people of Natlan as a medium to communicate with the "Night Kingdom."
